entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Oxford House

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
